1604066168_mirrored_tomachinz_github.body: I'm having the same issue and cannot find a solution. I've used the supplied key from the tutorial and it keeps telling me "Content signing failed. Private key invalid! Valid signers". I've gone into ZeroNet and the users.json to find more keys and it changes nothing. Anyone ever figure this out?

Content signing failed
Private key invalid! Valid signers: [u'1KugrB6oSZNHN96PM7CRNze7iL8Qs58QkL']

That key is the address of the site but with u' before it

Content signing failed
Private key invalid! Valid signers: [u'1KugrB6oSZNHN96PM7CRNze7iL8Qs58QkL'], Private key address: 1J6csQA9K9NZaYUiCG5C2XQRF85yB5PGaJ

I'm following the ZeroChat tutorial:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post:99:ZeroChat+tutorial

I get to the part where you send a message for the first time and it shows the above error message. The actual message does get appended to the user folder properly.

It seems that I'm a little dislexic and overlooked something simple. My data/users/content.json was actually named contents.json. So when I signed it (using the sidebar) it created a content.json. 

So this problem was solved by 
- recreating the data/users/content.json (using the code from the tutorial)
- deleting data/users/contents.json
- signing data/users/content.json
